product.title: Arcilla | 5
product.description: Stackabl’s third pendant collection – available individually and in clusters – was inspired during a pilgrimage taken by the design studio’s founder, Jeff Forrest. Escaping Toronto’s dreary 2022 winter weather, Forrest took a road trip southwest to Texas, seeing works by some of his art and architecture heroes, including Donald Judd, Louis Kahn, and Richard Serra, as he went. An inspiring expedition, it was the rich palette of the landscape he passed through that impressed upon him the most. These luminaires – in vivacious clay, earthy oat, and charcoal tones – are sure to transport you somewhere soothing, from the comfort of your own homes.
